cat.lump.ir.lucene

Class LuceneInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • cat.lump.ir.lucene.LuceneInterface
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LuceneIndexer, LuceneIndexerWT, LuceneQuerier, LuceneQuerierWT

    public abstract class LuceneInterface
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class with the necessary data and methods to interact with Lucene's indexer and querier modules.
    Author:
    alberto
